title: Phone confiscated
content: What can I do if a teacher takes my phone in class and intends on returning it only after the sem ends?? feels illegal

comments.body:
Be happy [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gdGmYDz_d6A) did not happen

Jokes aside, probably go talk to them and try coming to an agreement
Talk to her, usually and Apology letter is enough to get it back. Be smart.

Tell her you need to book a cab to go home

Apologize and get the phone back :')
tried all of that, but to no avail
did talk to her super nicely, did not happen
Out of curiosity who's the proff??
Wait do you not have your phone right now?
Isn't there someone in college who helps students with these types of stuffs
